name: ZSNES Slot 3 Saved State File
summary: Learn about .ZS3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ZSNES provides numerous save states from 0 to 99 (file extensions .ZS0, .ZS1, .ZS2, and so on).

NOTE: ZSNES save states are different than in-game save states since ZSNES save states can be created at any point during gameplay. In-game save states typically are controlled by milestones within the game content.

description: Save stat file created by ZSNES, an SNES emulator for PCs; stores a saved game snapshot for an emulated game; used to save and load game progress.
